subject: Hockey, Ice
Golf
Philanthropy
lead_paragraph: Joe Sakic, a 13-time N.H.L. All-Star, hit a two-hopper into the cup on the waterfront par-3 17th at the American Century Celebrity Golf Championship at Lake Tahoe.
snippet: Joe Sakic, a 13-time N.H.L. All-Star, hit a two-hopper into the cup on the waterfront par-3 17th at the American Century Celebrity Golf Championship at Lake Tahoe.
